body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things to Do          2016 Visitor Guide The 2016 Visitor Guide (pdf, 2 MB) provides the best planning map and overview of things to do in the park and preserve.                         Hiking and Backpacking            Sandboarding and Sand Sledding            Splashing in Medano Creek            Free Ranger Programs           Experience the Night           Photography           4WD Medano Pass Road            Visitor Center           Horseback Riding           Accessible Activities           Junior Ranger Program           Nearby Attractions           Fat Biking Medano Pass Road            Fishing           Hunting (only in national preserve during legal seasons)
title: Great Sand Dunes National Park & Preserve: Things To Do
